website_summaries.verdict: Whimsical cat doing the downward dog adds a fun motif.
pros: Antiqued cast iron is heavy and won’t tip over
Can be used for paper towels too
cons: Once a roll has been started, it will unwind itself, so it's best used for backup rolls

customer_reviews.title: Who knew a TP holder could bring joy!?
customer_reviews.text: Who knew a toilet paper holder could bring joy!? It is super cute and very sturdy. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Allan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and different
customer_reviews.text: Works well for toilet paper or paper towel. Some Brands paper towels unravel themselves and are not as functional. Good to get paper towels have a tendency to stick to themselves a little so that when sitting on the counter it doesn't unraveling cover the cat. Viva and Brawny work well
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: One problem, otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. And I like the picture! However because of the structure the tale does not screw in tight or flat to the body so the tail wobbles though the cat stays solid on Surface. Did not realize it came in two pieces, which is a good idea for shipping. Unfortunately the parts I guess our caste separately rather than cut apart so tail does not fit properly on the cat. Even if you're not worried about the tail lining up as it does in the picture the unevenness of the two parts that go together do not allow them to fit properly, thus the tail wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: S. Summers

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, one of the legs hwas snapped off even though it was shipped in styrofoam. Aside from that, had it not been broken you need a lot of space between your counters and your cabinets, this would not fit unless you put it in an area where there are no cabinets overhead unless they are placed unusually high. There were no pads or anything on the feet so it seems as though getting the sheet off without two hands would be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 rolls of toilet tissue. Guests love it.
customer_reviews.text: Small bathroom with no space large enough for a hanging toilet paper holder. Put this on the floor in front of the commode, put on 3 rolls of toilet paper and it works fine, easy to reach. Company loves the novelty of the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo lady

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not one piece like pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, but not one solid metal piece like pictured. I still left 4 stars because customer service was excellent! I told them about the problem, and they sent a replacement. Still two pieces (tail screws into body), but the gap wasn’t as extreme. Still looks cute as long as toilet paper is covering/hiding it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get this!  You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!!!! This is one of the cutest pieces I’ve bought, and I just adore it. I see that there are other animals, and I believe I will purchase a few different ones for each of my rooms with all the pandemic needs for cleaning and sanitary use. It’s definitely a sturdy piece, and it will stay wherever you put it while grabbing paper towels. A+ from me!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Quality, MUST GET ONE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cat! I bought one for my daughter for Christmas and it was a huge hit. This cat is HEAVY and well made. I'm getting one for me! It can hold either a paper towel roll or toilet paper rolls. Too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: screw-on tail ruins the line and is conspicuously askew at that joint
customer_reviews.text: My first yoga cat (all of one piece) holds toilet paper and is wonderful; the white yoga cat has a screw-on tail that doesn't seat properly so it ruins the line of the tail, which is much of the charm . Felt added to the feet bottoms would be an improvement if not so ill-fitted. The paper towel roll hides the joint and masks the tail line but this one was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two purchases, same issues.
customer_reviews.text: Scratched, on underside, tail and face. It's like they didn't even bother to paint it all. The tail section wouldn't fit into the body, no matter how much force I used. And this was my replacement order. These pictures are pretty much the same as the ones from the first purchase. I returned this one too and bought one from an outside seller. It was beautiful and in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: F B

customer_reviews.title: so cute - want to get one for every bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for the guest bathroom and a frog one for the kids room. Have to say this is cuter than the pictures - fits 3 rolls of toilet paper. Frog is not as cute and shorter - fits 2 rolls. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Living in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Toilet Paper Holder
customer_reviews.text: Very cut toilet paper holder for any dachshund lover. If you want to use it as a paper towel holder, it isn't quite big and sturdy enough to work. For toilet paper, on the other hand, it works perfectly. It is cast iron and has some weight to it and doesn't feel "cheap". I would definitely recommend this to anyone who collects dachshund figures or just loves dachshunds.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Green

customer_reviews.title: Not worth this much money
customer_reviews.text: I kept this in my cart for a really long time till I could justify spending the money. Not worth the money. You have to screw the tail end and it comes loose all the time. It comes with two screws for this to happen so obviously I’m not the first person to have a problem with it. Plus the face is not attractive. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nooney

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect ... but...
customer_reviews.text: This was an almost perfect product ... except for one significant shortcoming. The tail and body of the cat are secured together with a screw which protrudes from the cat's body -- you thread the tail on to the body and it is assembled. BUT .. in our case, the screw was 1/4" too long, so when tightly screwed in,, there was 1/4" gap between the tail and the body. Did not look good. I fixed this myself by filing off 1/4" of the screw. Folks not mechanically inclined and/or without the needed tools, would have been very annoyed. Once fixed -- very nice.
customer_reviews.author: T. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect accessory you never knew you needed
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOVE this thing. The color matches my bathroom hardware and blends in nicely but still sticks out enough to add flair. This is a very heavy piece with a long pointy tail so I would advise parents to make it very clear that this is NOT a toy! You could really do some damage. This would be a great gift for the crazy cat lady in your life that already has all she needs. Everytime I walk in the bathroom and see my little stretchy cat I smile. Not tacky and holds up to 4 rolls of toilet paper but can also be used for paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanqua

customer_reviews.title: Cute, more decorative than functional
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's cool. Works best with the more expensive and clingy paper towels so as not to unravel over the face of the cat. Not a rip and go type holder, you need to hold and tear a sheet. It's weighty and sturdy enough. Tail comes in 2 pieces, mine fit nicely together. If you like the look you will love it and be gentle on it.
customer_reviews.author: CJZ

customer_reviews.title: Cats!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to hold toilet paper in my tiny bathroom. It looks adorable and does a great job of keeping the paper neat. If you love cats, this is a must for your bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Lara K Watson

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE FELINE FUN for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly happy with this purchase! I was initially hesitant, because who spends so much for a paper towel holder?! But I absolutely think this was well worth it! I love the character and whimsy it adds to my kitchen. I smile every time I look at it. I’m going to definitely need to get another for the bathroom, or as a door stop! It is extremely solid and heavy! Like a brick heavy! Sooo happy I found this gem!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun to put on counter
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and heavy for paper towels which is what I bought it for. Having said that- should have deducted one star because the teeny tiny screw that holds both pieces was not secured and could not find it in the box. That’s an important detail- to make sure it’s attached to product otherwise your making a trip to Home Depot or Lowe’s
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. I love this! Very solid (not chintzy or cheap) material it's made with. And super-cute!
customer_reviews.author: Robinotl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and am using it in my bathroom ... it holds the larger rolls of toilet paper that would not fit in a traditional cylindrical holder. I am able to stack 3-4 rolls easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Unique and fun piece for anyone's kitchen or bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: This is so different and fun to put out with either paper towels or toilet paper rolls! Arrived quickly and well packaged, all you have to do is screw the tail on! Great, fun piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sharen M.

customer_reviews.title: The paper towel will start to unroll it's self because ...
customer_reviews.text: The paper towel will start to unroll it's self because its so far up and not on a flat base.
customer_reviews.author: Larz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy base but tail wobbles
customer_reviews.text: It looks really cute. It holds 2 large rolls of toilet paper. If you have cats who like to play with toilet paper, this may not be for you. The tail is a little wobbly where it screws into the cat body. As long as you pick it up by the base at the cats body/feet to move it, it's fine. I use it to store extra paper where guests can get to it. It does exactly what I need it to do while adding a bit if whimsey to the bathroom. It is very heavy and feels like iron or metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality varies
customer_reviews.text: Purchased first one and one solid piece. Was very nice. Second one came and the tail was a separate piece and screw missing to hold it together. Was a gift so a month went by before they got it and too late now to ask for replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: JARED

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. It’s small enough to fit anywhere. My cat is always in the bathroom with me anyway so this seemed appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for cat lover
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit under upper cabinets double check dimensions if you are planning to place it there
customer_reviews.author: Travis Maggard

customer_reviews.title: Puurrfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this paper towel holder. It is solid and sturdy. The craftsmanship is excellent. Super cute and stylish. I always get compliments. If you're a cat lover you will love this item!
customer_reviews.author: CarolsWorld

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Holds a paper towel roll beautifully, but I am currently using it to help me organize macrame cord on my craft table. Holds 6 spools of 1m cord. Really dresses up my mess! So much fun😁
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as the ones I've seen in catalogs but its okay
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: I love having something more interesting to hold my extra toilet paper convenient for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlettofdixie

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my Egyptian bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but the paper towel unrolls as it sits. I wish there was some sort of stop on the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Picard

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and so do all our guest!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy, great conversation piece. We use it to hold two rolls of toilet paper in our guest bathroom. One or three rolls of toilet paper doesn't look right. Tried it with paper towels, too. It works, but I didn't like it, aesthetically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat lovers!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my mother who loves her cat. She laughed so hard and loves it so. Now it has become a conversation piece!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Yoga cat paper towel holder
customer_reviews.text: The yoga cat paper towel holder is very stylish, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: peter j. powers

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Cat TP Holder
customer_reviews.text: So very cute and useful. It is really strong and heavy - just what you need it to be. Everyone likes it who sees it. I plan on giving this as presents next holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Raye Lamerdin

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: The product is true in color, no surprise there at all. The only issue we run into is that the holder (cat tail part) is slightly tilted, once you tear off one piece of the paper towel, the next one doesn't stay with the roll. Just have to re position the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ledvina

customer_reviews.title: adorable toilet paper storage
customer_reviews.text: Although not a cat lover this toilet paper storage with the yoga cat is adorable and does it's job beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bates

customer_reviews.title: broken kitty
customer_reviews.text: tail broke of 2 days after receiving it! should have listened to other reviews! big disappointment!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Adore this holder
customer_reviews.text: As a crazy cat lady artist, this is beyond perfect for holding my paper towels in my quirky art room. I love this so much! It's heavy, which is good, because it's very sturdy when ripping paper towels off.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for the kitchen paper towels and one for the bathroom extra toilet papers (holds 3 rolls).
customer_reviews.author: S. Embry

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute way to keep extra TP near the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: debbie louis

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!  Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It’s so cute in my bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Nicely decorative but the base isn't wide enough or heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely decorative but the base isn't wide enough or heavy enough to allow ripping off a towel with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: kind of pricey but...... it is really nice looking. I am really glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: BILLIE RUSSELL

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The yoga cat is an adorable addition to my bathroom. It is also very sturdy, so does not easily tip over. Holds 3 extra large rolls of toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Omg....it’s adorable, I love it!!!! I may buy another one! It is sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Unique cat paper towel holder
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and stylish paper towel holder. Love the car design. Very clever and whimsical!

customer_reviews.title: gift for sister
customer_reviews.text: very well made. tail screws into body. will be used for paper towels

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviews it’s awesome but paper roll falls out of place.

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and practical product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product that is sure to please anyone , but especially a cat lover.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my sort-of-cat-themed guest powder room to hold extra TP. Solid and heavy (stays put), keeps three extra rolls handy.
customer_reviews.author: Dubliner

customer_reviews.title: cool item
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool paper towel holder. it will be a conversation starter among my pet loving friends, when they come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken GayAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price and cute beyond words!
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and extremely cute. Get nice comments from all who use powder room! Good value. Holds 3 large rolls.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cute doorstop
customer_reviews.text: I am using this item as a doorstop. It is really cute. I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bullin

customer_reviews.title: Yoga kitty added fun to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Everyone comments on this cute paper towel holder! It goes so well in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C. Malec

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my friend's birthday and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, cute
customer_reviews.text: Have a black cat and love this in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Barb j

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect with this purchase. It was for my son's bathroom. It was a true cast iron, very heavy but does not take up a ton of room. Can easily fit two toilet paper rolls on it. My son absolutely loved it and is taking to his college apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Tail isn't secure
customer_reviews.text: The tail doesn't securely screw into the body so it wobbles. Returning this cat. I will try a different one to see if it is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable! Sturdy, and serves the purpose perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & functional
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough to not tip & Super cute Must have for every cat lover

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME YOGA CAT!
customer_reviews.text: THIS YOGA CAT IS AWESOME! AND ARLENE WANTED TO MAKE SURE I WAS HAPPY WITH IT,I TRULY AM! SO FREAKING CUTE,I LOVE CATS AND AM VERY HAPPY! VERY STURDY,AND USEFUL,THANKS ARLENE!

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome piece, holds toilet paper. Adds a little whimsy to a bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: cute and unique
customer_reviews.text: taller than i expected... but its cute and unique and looks good in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Howe

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. It holds 3 rolls of toilet paper, but I usually just put on 2 so more of the tail shows. This is in my powder room and guests always comment on it and ask where they can get 1.
customer_reviews.author: Kim V.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a very cute toilet paper holder for small space!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a toilet paper holder. I needed a smaller holder since I’m working with a small space. It’s perfect, exactly what it said it is and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lerch

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cat pt holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is our paper towel holder. It looks great, a wonderful whimsical, practical piece.

customer_reviews.title: Guests love it
customer_reviews.text: We get a lot of comments on how cute he is in the bathroom.

customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy Used it to hold toilet tissue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to hold all my bracelets. I absolutely love it. I got it in the blue so it would match my room.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great addition to the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It very handy and you never have to look for tissue

customer_reviews.title: Need pickup for return

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our kitchen holding a roll of papertowels. It's quirky and fun! It's heavy and can be used as a door stop. It would also be cute in a bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet but petite!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cat if used on a kitchen counter for paper towels. However if used on the bathroom floor for TP, it practically gets lost. It’s way smaller than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute! It's a good conversation piece. My only complaint is it doesn't sit quite flat.

customer_reviews.title: Place to keep extra toilet paper

customer_reviews.title: Not a scratching post
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my half bath. I love it! So cute. I keep the door closed on the off chance that my cats think its a scratching post.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I love my toilet paper holder. It is so unique.

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed. It is what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: This is what it says it is. I love it. I use thus for toilet paper holder.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Artistic Paper Towel Holder
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on my kitchen counter. However be mindful of the long cat tail. It did not fit under our kitchen cabinets, but we were able to find another spot for it.

customer_reviews.title: Repurposed as a scrunchie holder
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my daughter's scrunchies. It's super heavy but she loves it!

product_meta.title: Comfify Yoga Cat Decorative Paper Towel Holder or Toilet Paper Holder Adorable “Downward Dog” Pose Kitty- Cast Iron Paper Towel Stand - Antiqued Cast Iron Storage - Multiple uses - 19” Tall.
feature_bullets: DECORATIVE PAPER TOWEL HOLDER – Whimsical “stretching kitty” design fits all types of kitchen décor, clean and elegant look of antique finish cast iron upgrades your home with elegance and charm
FUNNY TOILET PAPER HOLDER – Compact design fits even small bathrooms and the look is superbly endearing; a funny bathroom décor item that adds convenience and exquisite appeal to your home
STURDY PAPER TOWEL STAND BASE – This vertical paper towel holder is heavy for convenient use, the sturdy base features no-slip design and suitable weight to tear paper easily and cleanly

CONVENIENT TOILET PAPER ROLL HOLDER – Designed to eliminate accidental unrolling and paper messes, wonderful for kids and guests; keeps your kitchen or bathroom tidy and manageable, and looking great!

HAPPY CUSTOMERS ONLY: We're so confident that you'll love our product, that we'll give your hard-earned money back if you're not thrilled with your purchase. Simply contact our friendly customer service team to make it right.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars481 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
